user_id._description: A unique, internal identifier for the user.

name._description: The user's full name, as it should be displayed.

zooteam._description: Zoo team indicates membership to a particular "team" (Core, Veterinarians, Code Contributors).  Leave blank for code contributors.

zoorole._description: Zoo role is applicable to core team members, otherwise omit field.

gscholaruser._description: The user's Google scholar profile ID

avatarurl._description: A link to a profile picture (image) for this user
